title: Tech Not All Republicans Are Boycotting Netflix Over Obama — & The Numbers... by Sara Hendricks 33 minutes ago
content: But, of course, angry social media users don’t always represent the real numbers on any given subject. According to new data from YouGov , Netflix has dropped in favor among Republicans and risen among Democrats, with the favorability rating dropping 16% for the former and rising 15% for the latter. But, according to YouGov, Netflix is still viewed favorably as a whole among Democrats and Republicans alike.
